Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.assetA: The address of the first asset.
params.assetB: The address of the second asset.

returns._0: priceFeed The address of the direct price feed.

getExchangeRate(address,address).details: If no price feed for the pair found, USD and ETH are used as intermediate tokens. A price for assetA/assetB can be derived if two data feeds exist: assetA/ETH and assetB/ETH (or assetA/USD and assetB/USD). If there is no price feed found, the code will return a message that no price feed found.

params.assetA: The first currency within the currency pair quotation (the base currency).
params.assetB: The second currency within the currency pair quotation (the quote currency).

returns._0: exchangeRate for assetA/assetB in 10**18 decimality which will be recalucaled in PrimexPricingLibrary.
returns._1: direction of a pair as it stored in chainLinkPriceFeeds (i.e. returns 'true' for assetA/assetB, and 'false' for assetB/assetA). Throws if priceFeed wasn't found or priceFeed hasn't answer is 0.

params.assetA: The address of the first asset.
params.assetB: The address of the second asset.

returns._0: The priceDrop rate as a uint256 value.

params.assetA: The address of the first asset in the pair.
params.assetB: The address of the second asset in the pair.

returns._0: priceDropFeed The address of the priceDrop feed associated with the asset pair.

getPriceFeedsPair(address,address).details: If there is no price feed found, the code will return a message that no price feed found.

params.baseAsset: The first currency within the currency pair quotation (the base currency).
params.quoteAsset: The second currency within the currency pair quotation (the quote currency).

returns.basePriceFeed: A tuple of basePriceFeed and quotePriceFeed. The addresses of the price feed for the base asset and quote asset respectively.

increasePairPriceDrop(address,address,ui.details: Only callable by the EMERGENCY_ADMIN role. The _pairPriceDrop value must be greater than the current priceDrop value for the pair and less than the maximum allowed priceDrop (WadRayMath.WAD / 2).

params._pairPriceDrop: The new priceDrop value for the pair (in wad)

params._eth: Weth address if eth isn't native token of network. Otherwise set to zero address.

setGasPriceFeed(address).details: Only callable by the MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role.

params.priceFeed: The address of the gas price feed contract.

updatePriceDropFeed(address,address,addr.details: Add or update priceDrop feed for assets pair. Only callable by the MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role.

params.assetA: The address of the first asset in the pair.
params.assetB: The address of the second asset in the pair.
params.priceDropFeed: The chain link priceDrop feed address for the pair assetA/assetB

params.assetA: The first currency within the currency pair quotation (the base currency).
params.assetB: The second currency within the currency pair quotation (the quote currency).
params.priceFeed: The chain link price feed address for the pair assetA/assetB

getDirectPriceFeed(address,address).notice: Retrieves the direct price feed for the given asset pair.

getExchangeRate(address,address).notice: Requests priceFeed for the actual exchange rate for an assetA/assetB pair.

getGasPrice().notice: Retrieves the current gas price from the specified gas price feed.

getOraclePriceDrop(address,address).notice: Retrieves the priceDrop rate between two assets based on the oracle pair priceDrop.

getOraclePriceDropFeed(address,address).notice: Retreives a priceDrop feed address from the oraclePriceDropFeeds mapping

getPairPriceDrop(address,address).notice: For a given asset pair retrieves the priceDrop rate which is the higher of the oracle pair priceDrop and the historical pair priceDrop.

getPriceFeedsPair(address,address).notice: Requests two priceFeeds - assetA/ETH and assetB/ETH (or assetA/USD and assetB/USD).

increasePairPriceDrop(address,address,ui.notice: Increases the priceDrop of a pair of assets in the system.

setGasPriceFeed(address).notice: Sets the gas price feed contract address.

setPairPriceDrop(address,address,uint256.notice: Function to set (change) the pair priceDrop of the trading assets

updatePriceDropFeed(address,address,addr.notice: Updates the priceDrop feed for a specific pair of assets.

updatePriceFeed(address,address,address).notice: Add or update price feed for assets pair. For only the admin role.
